information.title: PPC Monitoring &
information.content: We adopt an iterative, sprint-based approach and take the performance data and audience insights into consideration and optimize the campaign strategically based on data. Lastly, a comprehensive and transparent report is sent to clients to review their ad spends.

faqs.title: What is SEM or PPC?
faqs.content: SEM refers to Search Engine Marketing also known as PPC (Pay Per Click). SEM involves various practices to surpass the stack of websites and appear in the best location on the first page of Google. It further allows you to appear on various applications and devices of your intended audience at the desired time. In a nutshell, SEM helps in achieving faster results.

faqs.title: Is SEM different than SEO?
faqs.content: SEM is optimizing your website's visibility on the search engines like Google through paid ads. You achieve faster results but only for the time, you run your ads. Whereas, SEO is a long-term strategy for organic growth. Results take time but help you drive consistent traffic m-o-m.

faqs.title: How will PPC benefit my business?
faqs.content: PPC drives quick results in your website optimization endeavors. Here are all the perks of PPC marketing: Fast results, Branding, Precise targeting, Measure performance
